headline: Bank of America resets IBM price target after earnings
summary: IBM (IBM) reported a strong Q4 earnings report on January 28, and the stock closed 5.13% higher on the next day, according to Yahoo Finance. Investors reacted more positively to Q4 earnings than they did in Q3, which was also a strong earnings report. I covered Q3 in my article “Bank of America ...

headline: 89% of MSCI Indexes Trigger Bank of America Overbought Signal
summary: Bank of America says market breadth breached its sell threshold as $15.4 billion exited equity funds last week.

headline: Bank Of America Weighs Volvo Extension Trump Accounts And Growth Plans
summary: Bank of America extended its partnership with Volvo Car Financial Services through 2030, reinforcing its role in US automotive financing and retailer support. The bank and JPMorgan Chase plan to match contributions to the federal government's new Trump accounts, a tax advantaged retirement program for children. Bank of America is also continuing its digital transformation and expanding its branch network, reflecting a blend of online and in person growth priorities. For investors watching...

headline: BofA Awards $500,000 Grant to FIND Regional Food Bank
summary: Bank of America has awarded a $500,000 grant to FIND Regional Food Bank to help complete its capital campaign for a new 40,000 square-foot warehouse on its Food Security Campus. The largest food bank and distribution center in the region, FIND Regional Food Bank's new facility provides nearly three times the space to meet record-level demand.

headline: BofA Trims Amazon.com (AMZN) Target but Sees Upside from AWS and Advertising
summary: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) is one of the Buzzing AI Stocks on Wall Street. On January 27, BofA Securities analyst Justin Post lowered the price target on the stock to $286.00 (from $303.00) while maintaining a “Buy” rating. The price target cut comes ahead of the company’s February 5 earnings report. BofA expects Amazon to report fourth-quarter […]

headline: BofA’s Hartnett Warns Overbought Global Stocks Face Sell Signal
summary: The stretched positioning coincides with investors pulling $15.4 billion from equity funds over the week, the BofA strategists said, underscoring increased caution as stock markets pushed higher.  The MSCI World Index hit an all-time high on Jan. 27 and is on track for its strongest month since September.

headline: BNY dismissed from Epstein case, but BofA must face some claims
summary: A judge rejected allegations that Bank of America failed to uphold anti-money laundering and know-your-customer standards. The lender, however, will face a claim that it obstructed the enforcement of trafficking laws.

headline: Xencor (XNCR): BofA Bullish on US Biopharmaceuticals Coverage
summary: Xencor Inc. (NASDAQ:XNCR) is one of the best high short interest stocks with biggest upside potential. On January 6, Bank of America raised its price target for Xencor to $20 from $17 while maintaining a Neutral rating. This sentiment was announced by the firm as part of its broader update to its US Biopharmaceuticals coverage. […]
